Synopsis:
You\'ve visited lands traversed by Cyclops (Sinbad and Princess), or where fighting skeletons (Jason and the Argonauts) and cowboys lasso dinosaurs hunt in the style of the West (The Valley of Gwangi). Are the worlds of Ray Harryhausen, the master of animation effects frame by frame, which creates another dazzling realm in Clash of the Titans.

Olympian gods, mythological monsters and heroes mortals populate this imaginative spectacle. Harry Hamlin is Perseus, mortal son of Zeus (Laurence Olivier) and champion of captive Andromeda (Judi Bowker). On this basis Harryhausen gives life to the Kraken sea creature, the snake-haired Medusa, the inhabitants of the swamp Calibos, the flying horse Pegasus, the two-headed dog Dioskilos, giant scorpions and all kinds of amazing adventures. To start the fighting!
